name: SKULLRUSH (vanillaspace)
description:
Craft your perfect defense and STOP the evil skeletons from delivering chaos to your realm. The king has granted anyone who will protect and fight for him a legendary sword as a reward.

Info

This game was made in under 48h from design to publishing. Bugs are expected, please report them in the comments. 

This game is made for Mini Jame Gam #11 !

  • Theme: Delivery
  • Special item: Sword
Donations

Donations are appreciated, 100% will go to Youth Fusion, a non-profit, non-partisan organization that establishes partnerships between high schools and universities, in an effort to counter high school dropout rates, by creating and implementing projects that motivate youth and keep them interested in school.

Credits
  • KayKit Character 3D models
